name: ~ Lume's Creeper Vines ~
description:
~ Lume's Creeper Vines ~ 

This scene was captured by an academic while they traversed the Inland Forests of Lume. The scholar noted the location of the passageway, in hopes of studying the curious ruins on their return trip. Two seasons later they returned - armed with a noggin' overflowing with questions - but the ingress had disappeared among dense vines. This is the only recorded sighting of the abandoned city of mountain spires. Who can guess what else lies forgotten beneath Lume's verdant vegetation? - 

More on these questing vines below, plus a list of other flora, and their uses.
https://lumelibrary.com/index.php?title=Creepers


4961 x 7087px

19.3mb jpeg, CMYK 

For personal, non-commercial use.
